author: jihed_91
notes: First time running this deck , got to legend 3 in less than 20 wins and then switched to GK to test Visionary with the new box . Needless to say it failed and closed it out with Heroes . Needle Ceiling was my tech of choice this season against swarm ( Geargia and Sylvans) and did put in work sometimes but it wasn't crucial . However Cosmic Cyclone was the MVP against SpellBooks
